document_data.name: Thalaumbur
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2014)/Waterdeep alleys}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Thalaumbur''' was a wealthy merchant in the city of [[Waterdeep]] in the 11{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Thalaumbur was known be a rather cold and calculating character, what some might describe as villainous.
document_data.Activities: Thalaumbur made multiple attempts to earn the title of nobility in Waterdeep, but was repeatedly shunned.
document_data.History: In life Thalaumbur owned a block of buildings in Waterdeep that were enclosed by [[Sulmor Street]] and (what would later be named) [[Thalaumbur's Trot]]. At some point he attempted to acquire [[lich]]dom by purchasing it from someone, though his ultimate fate after this was unknown.
